description:
Modern, lightweight and multi-cluster Kubernetes GUI.

Modern, lightweight and multi-cluster Kubernetes GUI. Available on Windows, macOS and Linux.
Features:
- 💯 Connect to one or more clusters simultaneously
- ⚡️ Aggregated Log Viewer
- ⚖️ Resource Diff
- ✌️ Multi-Namespace Selector
- 💪 Human-friendly resource view
- ✍️ View & modify objects
- 🎉 Zero-config setup
- 😉 NOT another Electron app
- ✅ Works with any Kubernetes cluster: on-prem, GKE, EKS, AKS and others.
- 💻 Available on Windows, macOS and Linux
✨ What's new
- You can now pin menu items and resources to the top of the left side bar using the new Favorites feature!
🐞 Bugs Fixed
- fix for lead whitespace missing on logs
- fix for empty space when zooming in/out on the log viewer #482
- fix bug pod status showing as Complete when there are other containers still running #483
📸 Screenshots
